com.novell.ldapchai
Class AbstractChaiUser

java.lang.Object
  com.novell.ldapchai.AbstractChaiEntry
      com.novell.ldapchai.AbstractChaiUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChaiEntry, ChaiUser
public abstract class AbstractChaiUser
extends AbstractChaiEntry
implements ChaiUser

A complete implementation of ChaiUser interface.

Clients looking to obtain a ChaiUser instance should look to ChaiFactory.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard

Constructor Detail

AbstractChaiUser

public AbstractChaiUser(String userDN,
                        ChaiProvider chaiProvider)
This construtor is used to instantiate an ChaiUserImpl instance representing an inetOrgPerson user object in ldap.

Parameters:
userDN - The DN of the user
chaiProvider - Helper to connect to LDAP.
Method Detail

getAssistant

public final ChaiUser getAssistant()
                            throws ChaiOperationException,
                                   ChaiUnavailableException
Description copied from interface: ChaiUser
Convenience method to find the this ChaiUser's assistant. Evaluates the ChaiUser.ATTR_ASSISTANT attribute and returns the equivalent ChaiUser.

Specified by:
getAssistant in interface ChaiUser
Returns:
a ChaiUser instance referencing the assistant of the user or null if there is no assistant
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable

getDirectReports

public final Set<ChaiUser> getDirectReports()
                                     throws ChaiOperationException,
                                            ChaiUnavailableException
Description copied from interface: ChaiUser
Convenience method to find this ChaiUser's direct reports. Evaluates the ChaiUser.ATTR_DIRECT_REPORTS attribute and returns the equivalent ChaiUser.

Specified by:
getDirectReports in interface ChaiUser
Returns:
A collection of ChaiUser instances that represent this ChaiUsers's direct reports. If this ChaiUser does not have any direct reports, then an empty collection is retured.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable

Specified by:
getGroups in interface ChaiUser
Returns:
A collection of ChaiGroup instances that represent this ChaiUsers's direct reports. If this ChaiUser does not have any group memberships, then an empty collection is retured.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable

readStandardIdentityAttributes

public Properties readStandardIdentityAttributes()
                                          throws ChaiOperationException,
                                                 ChaiUnavailableException
Description copied from interface: ChaiUser
Convienence method to read several of this ChaiUser instance's general identity attributes, such as name, phone number and email address. The attributes to be read are specified by ChaiSetting.STANDARD_IDENTITY_ATTRS.

Specified by:
readStandardIdentityAttributes in interface ChaiUser
Returns:
A Properties containing the attribute names as keys, and the ldap value as the value.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
